Welcome to the website for Introduction to R Programming!  

This website contains course materials and outside resources for an introductory R programming course.

# Website Content

The <span style = 'color: #a6873b;'>**Schedule**</span> section provides a schedule of topics and links to supplemental resources.  

The <span style = 'color: #a6873b;'>**Resources**</span> heading lists several helpful resources for R learners.  R for Data Science will serve as the primary text for this course.  It's available for [free online](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/){target="_blank"}, but well-worth the cost for the [paper copy](https://www.amazon.com/Data-Science-Transform-Visualize-Model/dp/1491910399/ref=sr_1_1?crid=UJMS0UH3O9KN&keywords=r+for+data+science&qid=1650063947&sprefix=r+for+data+scienc%2Caps%2C201&sr=8-1){target="_blank"}.

The <span style = 'color: #a6873b;'>**Modules**</span> heading contains most of the course content.  Each module has several components (lecture slides, R code, Summary files) in a pop-out menu.  

The <span style = 'color: #a6873b;'>**Glossary**</span> heading provides a definitions of important concepts and functions in R.
